extendedInfo.description: Donât pay for SMS packs when you can send them for FREE!Send SMS for free right from your Android Phone!Free SMS India is Android application by which you can send SMS to anybody all over India without spending single penny.  User Interface of Free SMS India is very sleek and simple, even a kiddy can operate the app. All you need is working GPRS connection to send SMS. Application is optimized to decrease data usage and your SMS is sent in few Kb of data. In our latest version of Free SMS India, following gateways/services are enabled:- Way2SMS- FullonSMS- 160by2- SMS440- IndyaRocks- YouMint - Ultoo- FreeSMS8If you want us to add any new gateway/service do send me email at freesmsindia.help@gmail.comAs soon as I get your request I will start working on it and in next update you will surely find that gateway.If you already have account with above given sites, download app and start using their services right from your phone. SMS are delivered in few seconds !!Find Official Review of Free SMS India here: http://www.geekygyaan.com/review-free-sms-india-android-app.htmlBy Geeky Gyaan. 5/5 ratings!To stay updated about Free SMS India follow the links below:- http://freesmsindia-android.blogspot.com/- http://trickstree.com/free-sms-india-android/- http://www.facebook.com/FreeSMSIndiaAndroidIf you are facing any kind of problem do mail me as replying your queries here is not possible.Iâll do my best to solve your query Disclaimer:"Free SMS India" is not developed by/associated with/licensed from orin any other way officially linked with Way2SMS or FullonSMS or anygateways/services appearing in the app. This is not an official app for any ofthe SMS gateways/services

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app is amazing and seriously useful but please improve the GUI. It should me more attractive and colorful rather than having a black n white appearence.

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: Truly fast delivery n user friendly...

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Absolutely great app please if possible make the UI more attractive and customizable.. then I\'ll surely give it a 5star thanks and keep up the good work!

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Gr8! Very  easy to operate, jst need to sign in once.  Syncs the contacts in ur phonebook also. Its simple and beautiful!

reviews.title: Superb . Marvellous
reviews.comment: Too cool and too good app. Free sms sending. The best app of sms in play store.  Just marvellous,brilliant app..

reviews.comment: Such a very good app to send messages without any charges.. U can use it as ur default message box.   SuBhAsH

reviews.comment: The app is gr8..many gateways supported.. Recently way2sms msgs are not being delivered many times.. And plzz add delivery status that will b awsome! :)

reviews.title: Simple, yet Brilliant
reviews.comment: Its so simple to use. No excessive UI tweaks. Just a plain ol\' messaging app with an amazing service. Reminds me of the old bbm. Great work on SMS integration as well. Keep up what you\'re doing, Its great!
